name: Lower Merion Township v. 34 Derwen Road, Inc., et al., Appellants
name_abbreviation: Lower Merion Township v. 34 Derwen Road, Inc.

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Pattersqn, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
parties: Lower Merion Township v. 34 Derwen Road, Inc., et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The decree is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Dannehower. Costs to be paid by the appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Benjamin H. Heilman, with him Raymond Pearlstine, for appellants.
John E. Forsythe, Jr., with him Edmund:B. Spaeth, Jr., Federico F. Maueh and Wright, Maucic, Hawes & Forrest, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Lower Merion Township v. 34 Derwen Road, Inc., et al., Appellants.
Argued April 12,1949.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Pattersqn, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
Benjamin H. Heilman, with him Raymond Pearlstine, for appellants.
John E. Forsythe, Jr., with him Edmund:B. Spaeth, Jr., Federico F. Maueh and Wright, Maucic, Hawes & Forrest, for appellee.
May 23, 1949:
